views.markdown:
- Fixed a rendering issue on iPad Pro - Added iOS 10 support - Fixes a crash when invoking Siri
- Fixed a crash issue when AquaBoard was disabled in settings
- Fixed a wallpaper switching issue when previous wallpaper was shared and dynamic and new static wallpaper was set only on homescreen.
- Fixed a crash issue when AquaBoard is disabled

- Added support for iOS 8.0 to 9.3.3
- Improved wallpaper grabbing methods eliminating glitches and screen flickering
- Improved rendering methods ensuring best image quality when effect is running
- OpenGL rendering happens only once per static wallpaper image and is never needed again until the wallpaper changes.
- OpenGL rendering works in the background for dynamic wallpapers and captures the content without glitches.
- Includes bug fixes reported on previous versions on iOS 8
- Fixed an issue that caused a crash when invoking Siri on iOS 9
- Fixed an issue that caused an annoying delay when unlocking the device on iOS 9
Compatible with iOS 9 - Improved main wallpaper binding method
- Fixed an issue where sometimes wallpaper might appear black
- Fixed an issue where zoomed wallpaper images might show a black border
- Less memory usage
- Better handling of combination of dynamic and static wallpapers in lockscreen/homescreen.
- Fixed "License file corrupted" error that appeared if AquaBoard was disabled from settings
- Fixed wallpaper placement when display is zoomed
